content: I'm looking for some recommendations on coffee tables. I'm interested in a mid-century modern style, and I found a great deal on Craigslist, but I'm not sure if I should go for it. Do you have any tips on what to look for when buying a used coffee table? By the way, speaking of furniture, I recently had my office chair repaired for $50, and it's made a huge difference in my work-from-home comfort.
